comments.text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux i686; rv:2.0b10pre) Gecko/20110113 Firefox/4.0b10pre
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux i686; rv:2.0b10pre) Gecko/20110113 Firefox/4.0b10pre

Title says all

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Choose Tools > Clear Recent History
2. In the dialog window you can select almost everything with keyboard execpet Clear and Cancel

Actual Results:  
No access to the features for keyboard-only navigation

Expected Results:  
Everything should be accessible from keyboard in interface.

comments.text: Confirmed on windows 7 trunk. OS --> All
